Class EnquiryEditor

java.lang.Object
enquiry.EnquiryEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
RepliableEditorInterface
public class EnquiryEditor extends Object implements RepliableEditorInterface
The EnquiryEditor class manages enquiries for a specific BTO project. It implements RepliableEditorInterface interface, providing methods to create, edit, delete, and reply to enquiries.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EnquiryEditor(Project project)
    Constructs a new enquiry editor for the specified project.
